nodes.text: The Vandelae system was a star system in which the Vandelae star system Hossferins were based. In the year 0 ABY, Lord Hossferin of the Vandelae star system Hossferins traveled from the moons of Ai'ken Prime to the planet Ktath'atn in order to visit the world's Queen and introduced himself by explaining that he was from the system.
The Vandelae system was first mentioned in the comic book Star Wars 31, which was written by Jason Aaron and released on May 17, 2017.
